1.16.5.1.2.0: Added Gamemode controls. Streamlined code. Removed Done button. Now requires Kotlin for Forge >=1.11.1
1.16.5.1.3.0: Added config options. Currently only time configs work.
1.16.5.1.3.1: Weather delay config now changes the duration of the weather condition when a button is pressed.
1.16.5.1.4.0: Added a custom commands GUI, the keybind needs to be enabled in the Minecraft controls menu.
